lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Lorelei
[00:01.000] 作曲 : 宗立
[00:13.712]
[00:14.762]You're unsatisfied with your life.
[00:23.543]You feel anxious about everything.
[00:32.435]You don't know how to live as you like.
[00:41.193]Dragging your body day out and day in.
[01:12.304]Take a deep breath close your eyes.
[01:16.403]Why not have a daydream？
[01:20.499]P-Pick a cloud,
[01:23.599]Carry you to the far, far sky.
[01:29.777]Hey just chill out, a tipsy smile.
[01:34.133]One day,
[01:38.499]You'll find the tune for your own song.
[01:47.515]Day, daydream.
[01:49.761]Drink, drank, drunk.
[01:51.925]Day, daydream.
[01:54.161]Sing, sang, sung.
[02:15.056]You're unsatisfied with your life.
[02:23.291]But you know that you will fit right in.
[02:32.414]Nothing can stop you to live as you like.
[01:56.059]
[02:41.153]Keep going and enjoy day out and day in.
[03:12.337]Take a deep breath close your eyes.
[03:16.357]Why not have a daydream？
[03:20.421]P-Pick a cloud,
[03:23.334]Carry you to the far, far sky.
[03:29.726]Hey just chill out, a tipsy smile.
[03:34.052]One day,
[03:38.424]You'll find the tune for your own song.
[03:47.579]Day, daydream.
[03:49.682]Sing, sang, sung.
[03:51.837]Day, daydream.
[03:54.068]Drink, drank, drunk.
[03:56.467]Day, daydream.
[03:58.637]Sing, sang, sung.
[04:00.913]Ha, ha, ha...
[04:03.202]Ha, ha, ha...
